items.title: David Chen
items.label: AI Platform Developer

items.title: Rachel Kim
items.label: CTO at TechVision
items.description: The seamless integration of GPT-4, DALL-E, and other models is game-changing. We built our multi-modal AI platform without worrying about different APIs.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us on Discord or by email.

items.title: What is AI Universal Generator?
items.description: AI Universal Generator is a comprehensive platform that provides unified access to all major AI models including GPT-4, DALL-E, Midjourney, and more. Generate text, images, and videos through a single interface.

items.title: Which AI models are supported?
items.description: We support 20+ models including OpenAI GPT-4, Anthropic Claude, Google Gemini, Meta Llama, DALL-E 3, Midjourney, FLUX, Stable Diffusion, and many more. New models are added regularly.

items.title: How does pricing work?
items.description: We offer flexible pricing with both pay-as-you-go and subscription options. You only pay for what you use, with transparent pricing for each model. Start with free credits to test the platform.

items.title: Can I use my own API keys?
items.description: Yes! You can bring your own API keys for any supported provider. This gives you full control over your usage and billing while still benefiting from our unified interface.

items.title: Is there an API for developers?
items.description: Absolutely! We provide a comprehensive REST API and SDKs for popular programming languages. Integrate AI generation capabilities into your applications with just a few lines of code.

items.title: What about data privacy and security?
items.description: We take security seriously. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. We don't store your prompts or generated content unless you explicitly save them. Full compliance with GDPR and SOC 2.
